page.title: ServerlessDays - News
page.description: One Day. One Track. One Community

leads.headline: ServerlessDays Sydney is now ServerlessDays ANZ 2020
leads.description: ServerlessDays Sydney is combining forces with the rest of Australia and New Zealand to run one massive, amazing, remote-first, mult-track event dedicated to Serverless.

leads.headline: COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Update ServerlessDays Sydney 2020
leads.description: An important update on COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Update for ServerlessDays Sydney 2020

leads.headline: Announcing ServerlessDays Sydney 2020
leads.description: ServerlessDays Sydney 2020 is happening on 18 August at SMC Conference & Function Centre, Sydney. New venue, expanded program, more Serverless! Get your Serverless on!
